results.title: Living in Two Worlds
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Face Australia”.
Looks at a suburban industrial “ghetto” in Wollongong which is made up almost entirely of migrants.

results.title: Half a Chance
results.creator_credit: Ted Robinson, Eve Ash, Film Victoria and Seven Dimensions
results.brief_description: A collection of dramatised case studies of young offenders on probation. Both the probationer and the probation officer talk about the problems and advantages of this type of supervision.

results.title: You'll Be Back
results.brief_description:
Looks at the problems of readjustment that prisoners face on their release from gaol. The dramatisation of particular situations illustrates the type of troubles that may occur and representatives from various organisations, such as Legal Aid, Odyssey House and Personal Emergency Services, advise on how to avoid trouble.

Featuring Gary Sweet as the protagonist, and music by Rose Tattoo.

results.title: Eating your heart out [Edited version]
results.creator_credit: Trout Films, Chris Warner and Maureen McCarthy
results.brief_description: Eating your heart out is about food, dieting, and obsessional eating, especially as they affect women and girls in Western societies. The film looks at four eating disorders: anorexia nervosa; bulimia; obesity; and a condition known as the fat/thin woman. It also examines the wider societal pressures on women that lead to these eating obsessions.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Trout Films, Chris Warner and Maureen McCarthy

results.title: Marvellous Melbourne
results.creator_credit: Charles Cozens Spencer and Spencer Productions
results.brief_description: In this silent film approximately 15 static and moving shots, including those from a cable car, are separated by intertitles. They take on a Lumiere look with the way that they picture Melbourne’s main streets and buildings that were prominent at the time. The different fashion and the horse and cart transportation are even more fascinating in this familiar setting.
